item.title: Crystal add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how much you think you love somebody, you'll step back when the pool of their blood edges up too close." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Goodbye," said the fox. "And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I don't want to die without any scars." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Just for the record, the weather today is calm and sunny, but the air is full of bullshit." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Is sex dirty? Only when it's being done right." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Oscar Levant
item.description: "There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line." -- Oscar Levant

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it." -- Mae West

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I'm sorry. I use my rapier wit to hide my inner pain." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Crystal add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "When I was your age, television was called books." -- William Goldman

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To get back my youth I would do anything in the world, except take exercise, get up early, or be respectable." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "my heart has more rooms in it than a whore house" -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez
